overview: Ah, the Classics. There’s nothing like ’em. Take this titillating tale of bored gods and misguided mortals. The gods are looking for a little fun: the mortals want a little nookie. So, take and “odyssey” of the most erotic kind as our crew of over-sexed seamen set a course for high-seas humping that literally takes them right off the edge of the world!
title: Sirens
